com.google.android.drdat.gui.DrdatDataProvider

DrdatDataProvider Class Reference

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Content provider that gives access to participant generated data.

Used to get data, update the sent field and delete sent data. DrdatCL, the communications layer, takes care of sending data to smi. It uses this provider to manage the data for the upload process.

The delete, update and query methods are implemented. DrdatFormCollector actually does the work. These are designed to be more open ended in their operation.

Author:
cal

Generally used to get records where the sent field is null.

Override int update ( Uri  uri,
ContentValues  values,
String  selection,
String[]  selectionArgs 
)

Update drdat_data records.

Generally used to set the sent field to the timestamp sent back from the smi when an upload was successful. Data records are identified by email, password MD5 hash, study_id, task_id, and timestamp.

See also:
android.content.ContentProvider.update(android.net.Uri, android.content.ContentValues, java.lang.String, java.lang.String[])
